nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.text.ITextDecoratorSpigot

Packages that use ITextDecoratorSpigot
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.text
Provides utility classes and Text implementations that depend on the Spigot API and can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.

  • Uses of ITextDecoratorSpigot in nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.text

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    ClickableTextDecorator
    Represents a text decorator for the Spigot platform that decorates text with links that execute a command when clicked.
    final class 
    StyledTextDecorator
    Represents a text decorator for the Spigot platform that can add styles to text.
